channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Book Review: The New World Economy in 5 Trends
item.description: A diligent economist and an eclectic bookworm serve up an analysis of megatrends that will have the greatest impact on economies and investments: innovation, productivity, climate, multiglobalization, debt, and aging.

item.title: Elon Musk earns praise from Nvidia co-founder Jensen Huang ahead of shareholder vote on pay package—‘Tesla is far ahead in self-driving cars’
item.description: The ringing endorsement from Huang comes amid Musk's recent pivot to AI as the Tesla boss quietly scrapped his vision of growing volumes over tenfold to 20 million EVs a year by 2030.

item.title: Factor Strategies Belong in Your Completion Portfolio Toolkit
item.description: Why wouldn't you include factor strategies in your completion portfolio? A review of the two commonly used approaches for managing institutional assets highlights their symbiotic nature.

item.title: Mexico prepares to elect first woman leader as millions of domestic workers wonder if it will improve 'modern slavery'
item.description: "At least by having a woman, maybe things will be different."

item.title: For the Analyst: Peer Benchmarking Methods to Improve Earnings Forecasts
item.description: Peer benchmarking is a vexing task for financial analysts but one that is critical for forecasting earnings. This straightforward measure can help find peers for relative performance, compensation, and valuation benchmarking.

item.title: Europe-Israel relations take a hit as Spain, Ireland and Norway prepare to formally recognize a Palestinian state
item.description: Israeli Foreign Minister Katz accused Spain of “rewarding terror” by recognizing a Palestinian state, and said that “the days of the Inquisition are over.”

item.title: Building LLMs in the Open-Source Community: A Call to Action for Investment Professionals
item.description: Large language models like ChatGPT are changing the way we think about investing and reshaping roles in the investment profession.

item.title: Lina Khan’s noncompete crackdown could leave most doctors and nurses out in the cold
item.description: Provider groups are disappointed that the Federal Trade Commission’s new rule may not protect those who work for nonprofit hospitals and health care facilities, which employ the largest number of medical professionals.

item.title: Sustainability Reporting: Navigating Assurance Practices
item.description: Don't be lulled into a false sense of security by the word "assurance" when evaluating sustainability reports. Assurance practices vary, and investors would be wise to learn more about the different levels of coverage.

item.title: Abraham Lincoln museum in spotlight again after paying $15,000 for disputed flag
item.description: A director was fired in 2019 for sending without approval a copy of the Gettysburg Address, written in Lincoln's hand, to a Texas exhibit operated by conservative political commentator Glenn Beck.
